caption.p: ( A) The stress-strain curves of the prepared electrolyte membranes; ( B) Pictures showing the states of the membranes for RDC/KOH (8 M)-3 h before ( a) and after ( b) being clamped and RDC/PAAK/KOH (8 M)-3 h before ( c) and after ( d) being clamped; ( C) Specific mechanical values for RDC/KOH (8 M)-3 h and RDC/PAAK/KOH (8 M)-3 h.
